name: Capoeira: Go for the Head
description:
Leo is back with his abstract games serie, and if you've played ZenBall or Gladius then you know where this is going. Arcade mode is still under construction so you'll need a friend to play with you (but still, you can certainly play against yourself). "Capoeira" is aimed at reducing the actual Brazilian matial art down to its simpliest form.

P1: Press "Q" to change pivot, hold it to speed up.

P2: Press "P" to change pivot, hold it to speed up.

Hit that dot next to "2Players" to play.

Hit your foe's heads (either one) with your leg (the stick between nodes) to win. And the winner gets to... well... start the next game, like, literally.
